DataElement.preferredName: Tobacco Use Ever Worked in Place Where Other People Smoked Cigarettes Indoors Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response that indicates when thinking of all the years they have worked, whether a person has ever worked in a place where other people smoked cigarettes indoors.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tobacco Use Ever Worked in Place Where Other People Smoked Cigarettes Indoors
